Sentencas: Rubber composites are used in many applications such as the rubber O -ring in solid oxide fuel cell unit.
Titulo: Effect of Silicon Carbide on the Properties of Natural Rubber Blends with EPDM Rubber

Sentencas: O-ring is used to separate hydrogen and oxygen and it must withstand heat in the range of 600 - 1,000 degrees C. To improve thermal properties of O- ring rubber, silicon carbide (SiC) was applied to rubber owing to the high thermal stability and good oxidation and corrosion resistances.
Titulo: Effect of Silicon Carbide on the Properties of Natural Rubber Blends with EPDM Rubber

Sentencas: Blends of natural rubber/ ethylene propylene diene monomer (NR/EPDM) were prepared in an internal mixer.
Titulo: Effect of Silicon Carbide on the Properties of Natural Rubber Blends with EPDM Rubber

Sentencas: The semi-EV of Sulphur was used.
Titulo: Effect of Silicon Carbide on the Properties of Natural Rubber Blends with EPDM Rubber

Sentencas: The effect of the silicon carbide level (5, 10, 15, and 20 phr) on the cure characteristic, mechanical, thermal and morphology properties of silicon carbide filled 30:70 NR/EPDM were studied.
Titulo: Effect of Silicon Carbide on the Properties of Natural Rubber Blends with EPDM Rubber

Sentencas: The curing properties show that the tc(90) and tS(2) of NR/EPDM blends increased with the increasing SiC loading.
Titulo: Effect of Silicon Carbide on the Properties of Natural Rubber Blends with EPDM Rubber

Sentencas: The effect of SiC loading on the tensile strength of NR/EPDM blends showed that tensile of vulcanizates increased with the increasing SiC up until 10 phr, extra addition of SiC would deteriorate the tensile properties.
Titulo: Effect of Silicon Carbide on the Properties of Natural Rubber Blends with EPDM Rubber

Sentencas: The thermal oxidative property of SiC filled NR/EPDM were satisfactory at all SiC loadings.
Titulo: Effect of Silicon Carbide on the Properties of Natural Rubber Blends with EPDM Rubber
